pages.text: 50% spell cooldown at the expense of 35% increased mana cost and 15% reduced damage. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:focus/getting_started)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented.

pages.mod_text: You feel a mania begin to set in. You must cast spells! More!! Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition.
